TopicTitle: Wacky Race Throughout The Solar System!

Articles.Content:
I was inspired by a dead thread (Venus roleplay) to create something that should be good fun.

Rule list:

1. It is OK to use images, just don't use them all the time.

2. Don't be TOO random / silly, just be silly enough to make it funny and amusing.

3. Hello, sailor.

4. The race takes place either on planets, or space stations. Once a race is completed, the person in 1st place decides where the next race takes place.

5. Don't use OP attacks unless it's funny.

6. Please refrain from going outside the solar system / doing the race in the Kerbol system.

How Races Are won

It starts after a location has been selected by the previous winner. Please make it realistic. Ok, so here's how it works:

A player gets ahead of one another by attacking the other players, every time they do this, they get 1 point. You can not attack more then one player. You can, however, defend yourself. You can't eliminate another player, however. You can only make 1 post every 30 seconds.

The player with the most points after 10 posts wins.

I will start.

Location: Earth / Johnson space Center.
